message.body: Hey baby boy.. let me know what you want for xmas
Ahaha ok.. and Steph wants to know if you want her to get you weights?
I passed the police fitness exam! I had to run the mile and a half in 15:56 and i did it in 14:40
Thanks. I thought I was going to die because we weren't allowed to walk at all. But I used the tips you gave me, like putting my arms up and it helped some so thank you!
